food_recipes.title: Roti
instructions: In a bowl, combine flour (2 cup), a pinch of salt (1/2 tps) and oil (2 tbps)
Gradually add more warm water (3/4 cup) and knead until smooth
Cover and let the dough rest for 30 minutes
Cut the dough into small balls (golf-sized balls)
Flatten each ball with a rolling pin into thin circles and dust with flour to prevent sticking
Heat a flat pan to medium to high flame
Apply a little oil on the heated pan
Place the roti (flattened dough)
Cook until the roti puffs up
Flip the roti over and let the other side cook until golden spots appear
Stack in a clean cloth to keep soft
Additionally enjoyed with curry, butter chicken, rougaille etc

food_recipes.title: Chicken Kalia
instructions: Mix chicken with yogurt, ginger paste, garlic, turmeric, chili powder, and salt. Rest 30 min–2 hr.
Heat oil or ghee in a large pot.
Add cinnamon stick, cardamom pods, and cloves. Sizzle a few seconds.
Add sliced onion and sauté until golden.
Add chopped tomatoes and cook until soft and saucy.
Add marinated chicken. Stir and cook 10–15 min until yogurt thickens and chicken browns.
Add potatoes.
Add cumin, coriander, garam masala, and optional fennel. Mix well.
Pour ½–1 cup water depending on desired gravy thickness.
Cover and simmer 25–30 min until chicken and potatoes are tender, stirring occasionally.
Taste and adjust salt or spices.
Garnish with fresh coriander and serve hot with roti, farata, rice, or dholl puri.

food_recipes.title: Fried noodles
instructions: Boil noodles until just soft, drain, and set aside.
slice garlic and chop onions into thin slices
Heat wok/pan, fry garlic and onion until fragrant.
Add our optional meat and stir-fry until cooked.
Add remaining julienned vegetables and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes.
Mix in boiled noodles and stir well.
Season with sauces(soy and oyster sauce), salt, and pepper while stir-frying.
Stir-fry until noodles are evenly coated and slightly crispy.
Serve hot with garnish.

food_recipes.title: Briyani
instructions: Marinate 1 kg chicken pieces with 1 cup plain yogurt, 2 tbsp briyani masala, 1 tsp turmeric powder, 1 tsp chili powder (optional), 1/2 cup coriander leaves, and 1/2 cup mint leaves for 1 hour.
Wash and soak 3 cups basmati rice, then boil until half-cooked.
Fry 3 large onions (thinly sliced) until golden then set aside.
Fry 2–3 potatoes (cut in half) until golden.
Layer marinated chicken, fried potatoes, parboiled rice, fried onions, and 1/2 cup saffron milk (optional) in a cooking pot
Cover tightly and steam on low heat for 30–40 minutes until chicken is tender and rice fully cooked.
Fluff gently and garnish with fresh coriander leaves(optional)
enjoy with cucumber or tomato salad, tamarind or mango pickle (achar)

food_recipes.title: Boul Enversé
instructions: Cook 2 cups rice and keep warm.
Heat 2 tbsp oil in a wok, fry 200g chicken, beef, or prawns until cooked. Remove and set aside.
In the same wok, fry 1 onion (sliced), 2 cloves garlic (chopped), 1 carrot (julienned), and 1/2 cup cabbage (shredded) until tender.
Add 2 tbsp soy sauce, 1 tbsp oyster sauce (optional), and a little water. Stir in 1 tbsp cornflour mixed with water to thicken.
Return protein to wok, mix well with sauce and vegetables. Adjust salt & pepper.
Place stir-fry mixture at the bottom of a bowl.
Pack warm rice tightly on top, invert onto a plate.
Garnish with spring onions and chili paste if desired.

food_recipes.title: Homemade Pizza
instructions: Mix 1 tsp yeast, 1 tsp sugar, and 3/4 cup warm water. Let sit for 5–10 minutes until foamy.
In a bowl, combine 2 cups all-purpose flour, 1/2 tsp salt, 2 tbsp olive oil, and the yeast mixture. Knead until smooth.
Cover and let the dough rise for 1–2 hours until doubled in size.
Roll out the dough into a round pizza base.
Spread 1/2 cup tomato sauce (or rougaille-style tomato base) over the base.
Sprinkle 1 cup grated mozzarella cheese and add your choice of toppings: sliced sausages, chicken, onions, peppers, mushrooms, or local favorites.
Bake in a preheated oven at 200°C for 15–20 minutes until the crust is golden and cheese melts.
Garnish with dried oregano or basil. Slice and enjoy hot.

food_recipes.title: Rougaille Saucisse
instructions: Boil sausages for 5-10 minutes, drain and slice.
Heat oil, fry onions until soft.
Add a little garlic, ginger, chilies, stir until fragrant.
Add tomatoes and thyme, cook into thick sauce.
Mix in sausages and coat with sauce.
Simmer for 10-15 minutes.
Season and garnish with coriander.
Serve hot with rice or bread.

food_recipes.title: Lasagne
instructions: Heat 2 tbsp oil and 3 cloves garlic (chopped) until fragrant.
Add 500g minced meat and cook until browned.
Stir in 3 chopped tomatoes (or 1 cup puree), 2 tbsp tomato paste or ketchup, 1 cup mushrooms (optional), 1 tsp thyme (optional), and 1 tsp oregano (optional). Simmer until the sauce is thick.
Prepare cheese sauce: melt butter (20ml) and cheese, gradually add cooking cream, whisk until smooth. Season with salt, pepper
In a baking dish, spread a little oil, layer lasagne sheets, cheese sauce meat sauce on top, more tomato sauce, and cheese. Repeat until full.
Top with tomato sauce and a generous layer of cheese.
Bake at 180°C for 30–40 minutes until golden and fluffed
Serve with salad (optional)

food_recipes.title: Vindaye Poisson
instructions: Clean and cut 500g fish into medium chunks. Season with salt and 1 tsp turmeric powder.
Heat 3 tbsp oil in a pan, fry fish pieces until golden. Remove and set aside.
Grind 2 tbsp mustard seeds into a paste. Mix with turmeric, 3 cloves garlic (chopped), 1 piece ginger (grated), and 1/2 cup vinegar.
In the same pan, fry 2 large onions (sliced) until soft. Add 2 green chilies (optional) and vindaye paste. Cook until fragrant.
Return fried fish to the pan and coat well with the paste.
Add a splash of water if needed. Simmer for 5 minutes.
Let cool. Traditionally left overnight to absorb flavors.
Serve cold or at room temperature with bread, rice, or farata.

food_recipes.title: Macaroni egg rougaille
instructions: Boil 250g macaroni pasta in salted water while stirring (to prevent sticking) until it reaches an ideal texture (smooth and tender). Drain and set aside.
Heat 2 tbsp oil in a pan. Fry 1 onion (sliced) and 2 cloves garlic (chopped) until fragrant.
Add 2 chopped tomatoes and 1 chopped green chili (optional). Cook until tomatoes soften.
Crack 3 eggs directly into the pan. Stir and scramble until cooked.
Add boiled macaroni and mix well with the egg mixture.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Garnish with chopped spring onion and fresh coriander.
Serve hot with optional salad.

food_recipes.title: Salad
instructions: Slice 1 cucumber, 1 tomato, and 1 carrot into thin strips.
Tear lettuce leaves and mix with other vegetables.
Drizzle with lemon juice and season with salt and pepper.
Toss well and serve chilled
